DAO

Interface CustomerDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerDBDAO

    public interface CustomerDAO
    Author:
    Yakir Uzan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCustomer(Customer customer)
      Insert customer to the table Customer
      java.util.ArrayList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Get all customers from the table Customer and the coupons of any customer from the tables Customer_Coupon, Coupon
      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCoupons()
      Get the coupons of the current customer from the tables Customer_Coupon, Coupon
      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCouponsByPrice(float price)
      Get the coupons by price of the current customer from the tables Customer_Coupon, Coupon
      java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      Get the coupons by type of the current customer from the tables Customer_Coupon, Coupon
      Customer getCustomer(long id)
      Get customer from the table Customer and the coupons of this customer from the tables Customer_Coupon, Coupon
      boolean login(java.lang.String custName, java.lang.String password)
      Login to the system as a customer, search name and password in the table Customer
      void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Delete customer from the table Customer and delete all of the coupons of this customer from the table Customer_Coupon
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      Update customer in the table Customer
